FuncDef:
The srv6-te-policy path verification enable command enables fault detection for all SRv6 TE Policies.
The undo srv6-te-policy path verification enable command disables fault detection for all SRv6 TE Policies.
By default, the path verification function for all SRv6 TE Policies is disabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To enable fault detection for all SRv6 TE Policies, run the srv6-te-policy path verification enable command. The SRPOLICY component check the reachability of the SIDs in the segment list referenced by the SRv6 TE Policy. If they are reachable, the status of the segment list is up, and vice versa.
